features: Item Package Dimensions:12.192 cm L X 14.503 cm W X 16.51 cm H
32 Super Tampons; Individually Wrapped; Packaging May Vary From Image Shown; U By Kotex Feminine Products Are Now Fsa-Eligible In The U.S.
body.description: Stay protected from leaks and confident throughout your day with U by Kotex Security Regular Tampons featuring a smooth applicator for easy, comfortable insertion. Regular absorbency tampons expand to naturally fit your body, absorbing 6-9 grams of fluid. OBGYN-tested, these unscented tampons offer trusted period protection, keeping you focused on your day, not on your period. Each box contains individually wrapped feminine tampons that have no fragrance added. U by Kotex Security tampons with a plastic applicator are available in regular, super and super plus absorbencies. Looking for additional coverage? Try U by Kotex Lightdays Liners for backup protection. Consider Subscribe & Save so you never have to worry about running out of your feminine products. Packaging may vary from images shown. U by Kotex feminine products are now FSA-eligible in the U.S.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these tampons
reviews.reviewText: Did I pay $30 for 30 tampons. Yes, yes I did. They’ve stopped making these and they are the only ones that work well for me! Especially on workout days. I treat them like they are made of gold and horde them like Smaug under the mountain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This a great buy
reviews.reviewText: This is the only brand I buy to bad they cost so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are impossible to find and although I paid more than I used to they weren’t nearly as pricey as what others are selling them for! Very happy!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these tampons but the price?!
reviews.reviewText: I love these tampons and have been using them for years. Due to my medical disability these tampons are easier to hold and grip. I cannot believe the price of these 4$ box’s I once paid but I am just thankful I am able to purchase these but I will make them stretch as just to use a pad on light days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They sold me the clicks
reviews.reviewText: Really? I paid an s-load of $ for these tampons because the manufacturer decided to stop making them a couple years ago. I finally broke down and ordered 3 boxes at these outrageous prices. And they send me the clicks. NOPE! Not gonna happen! I’m getting my $ back and I’m super pissed! Just beware you may not get what is pictured if you chance ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price gouging for a much loved and needed discontinued product
reviews.reviewText: Like ALL recent reviews written..These have been my favorite tampons for over 20 years! I cannot believe the price gouging and that they are discontinuing! I have tried the newest Kotex “Click” a couple years ago and they absolutely suck! The mechanism(which is supposed to make them more compact) would constantly UNCLICK while you insert..which then pushed the tampon OUT of the applicator and would basically just fall on the floor! Biggest waste of money! I actually didn’t even realize until now that I paid $36 for 1 box of 32..thought it was at LEAST 2 boxes! 🤦🏻‍♀️ That was my fault for hastily purchasing “past items” that are in constant need! Glad I tapped “1 time only purchase” 😡Tampax sucks too!We all need to write to Kotex to bring them back!They were truly the best, most comfortable, and reliable tampons ever ☹️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t find in stores anymore
reviews.reviewText: Been using this plus/super plus since HS so glad I found on here. Extremely expensive but I am glad I can purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why the insane cost for a few tampons???
reviews.reviewText: I get that these tampons were discontinued (which is upsetting enough since I cannot find one other that’s as comfortable as these were). But how is the price gauging justified exactly for a product that si many women use and want?!? Appalling!!
